survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Online Grocery Delivery
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers regarding their satisfaction with online grocery delivery services to identify areas for improvement and enhance user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use online grocery delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale for clarity. Ensure options cover a broad range of usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you use online grocery delivery services?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when choosing an online grocery delivery service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow multiple selections. Ensure the options reflect common customer priorities.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when choosing an online grocery delivery service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of your most recent online grocery delivery?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected any option other than 'This is my first time' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Ensure it is displayed clearly on both desktop and mobile.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of your most recent online grocery delivery?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected any option other than 'This is my first time' in Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your online grocery delivery experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your online grocery delivery experience?
